title: New bookmarks at the top of the folder like in Opera GX
content: Is there a way for me to get firefox to save bookmarks to the top of a folder? I'm currently trying to switch over from Opera GX but I've really gotten used to new bookmarks saving to the top of a folder, and with some particularly large folders it's much nicer to have it at the top instead of having to scroll all the way down. I did come across some sorting extensions, but didn't automatically put it at the top. or sorted all my bookmarks by date added. which is also not what i want, because i also manually move things around.

content: Untuk mendaftar BWS (Bank Woori Saudara) m.Banking, Anda dapat melakukan pendaftaran melalui kantor cabang atau melalui menghubungi WhatsApp (BWS) +62813-4622-2852. Dan Pendaftaran melalui kantor cabang membutuhkan dokumen seperti bukti identitas diri, bukti kepemilikan rekening, dan dokumen legalitas perusahaan (jika untuk bisnis), sementara pendaftaran melalui BWS Mobile Banking memerlukan registrasi di kantor cabang terlebih dahulu, kemudian mengunduh aplikasi, dan mengikuti langkah-langkah pendaftaran di aplikasi.

title: Reports of "Trojan blocked" when I am on the Mozilla website
content:
Why am I receiving repeated warnings from Malwarebytes about blocking every-day websites due to a "Trojan"? The sites include Gmail, Ancestry.com, Newspapers.com and others.

The report warnings are being generated by the Malwarebytes program on my PC. They are confusing to me. I am running Windows 11. The warnings are being logged by the Malwarebytes program in the "Web Protection" section of its "Detection History" web page. In every instance, the log reports are the same: in the URL identification column there is no identification of the URL, only repeated instances of "N/A"; the IP address is identical for all the warnings; the port is always "0"; the file column alternates from "C:\Program Files\Mozilla\Mozilla VPN\Mozilla VPN.exe" to "System" and back again to "C:\Program Files\Mozilla\Mozilla VPN\Mozilla VPN.exe"; in the final column of the log, the Date column, the warnings began last evening, Monday the 12th, at 6:50 p.m. and have now extended to to a total nine warnings.

Even as I was writing this communication, the Malwarebytes warning popped up on my screen, telling me that this website and this web page are blocked due to the presence of a Trojan.

Is my PC infected? The Malwarebytes "scan" reports no "detections." I am at a loss.
creator: mark.frazier.lloyd

title: Firefox doesn't remember which desktop windows should open on
content:
I recently reinstalled Windows 11, Firefox used to remember which windows I had on which desktops and would open the appropriate windows on Desktop 1, Desktop 2, etc when I restarted my computer. It doesn't do that anymore. Every time I close Firefox and reopen it, it opens every single window on Desktop 1. Weirdly, even if I reorder my desktops, it'll still open every window on whichever desktop used to be Desktop 1, even if the number has changed.

I've tried deleting xulstore.json, refreshing Firefox, and even uninstalling Firefox and deleting all of Mozilla's files in every directory, but it just won't open the windows on the desktop I had moved them to.

title: Salasanojen automaattinen täyttö ei toimi
content: W11 käytössä. Salasanojen automaattisen täytön asetus F-Securessa on valittu käyttöön ja se näkyy myös Firefoxin laajennukset-sivuilla. Firefox ilmoittaa että se pitää vielä aktivoida F-Securen antamalla valtuutuskoodilla. Kun F-Securessa valtuutuskoodia yrittää valita Firefoxille niin se ei onnistu koska vihreä valintamerkki on Edge-selaimen kohdalla. F-Securen sivulla ei mainita etteikö voisi valita kahta selainta. Kun kuitenkin käytän kahta selainta eri tarkoituksiin ninn miten saan automaattisen täytön toimimaan myös Firefoxissa?

content: To contact with Moonpay Tool Hub number, call 💻⭐+1-(832)-520-2361. Support is available around the clock to help with tax calculations, compliance issues, and premier features. Call Now For 💻⭐+1-(832)-520-2361 Frequently Asked Questions (Q&A) Q1: Why is there a discrepancy in my Moonpay reconciliation? A: Reconciliation discrepancies can occur due to data entry errors, missing transactions, bank errors, or issues with the company file ⭐1-(832)-520-2361 Review the reconciliation report and verify transaction details to identify the cause. Q2: How do I review the reconciliation report in Moonpay ? A: Go to the Reports menu, select Banking > Reconciliation Discrepancy, and review the report for discrepancies ⭐1-(832)-520-2361. Q3: What should I do if I find missing transactions? A: Add the missing transactions in Moonpay and ensure there are no duplicates. Compare your bank statement with the transactions in Moonpay to identify any omissions ⭐1-(832)-520-2361. If you're facing account issues, withdrawal delays, or login problems, please call ⭐+1-(832)-520-2361 for immediate assistance. You can also respond to our last support email to continue an existing case. Our team is ready to help as soon as possible.

title: Tabs Not Restoring on Startup Despite Correct Settings
content:
I am writing to report an issue I’ve been experiencing with your browser. Despite setting the startup option to “Continue where you left off,” my open tabs are not being restored when I reopen the browser.

I have already taken the following steps to troubleshoot the issue: 

   Confirmed that “Continue where you left off” is enabled in the settings 
   Ensured I am not using incognito/private mode 
   Disabled all extensions to rule out conflicts 
   Verified that the browser is up to date 
   Checked for tab recovery options in history

Even after trying all these measures, the problem persists. I kindly request your assistance in resolving this issue.

Please let me know if you require any system logs or additional information.

Thank you for your support.
creator: lokeshbaskar9842

content:
Hello. I love the feature. I didn't know it was a new feature because I started using Firefox around April. I saved my group tabs, very happy about it. Then I close and save it, then I opened it again, it was great!

I am a student, I use my group tab to add the tabs that have the resources that I need to, and would also like to study for more knowledge and for my next school year.

There was no problem at that whole time. In April 21, there was no problem until April 22, 23 no problem. But I forgot my charger at that time, because I was at my mothers house. Then I wait for weeks for my charger to come back, about 2 weeks for my laptop to revive there in my grandparent's house.

When I got my charger, and opened firefox. Wait, but at first when I opened firefox, it showed me that there is a new update, an update about tab groups that I already now. I looked at my group tabs, and they are not there anymore.

What should I do to get them back.

title: Enabling Netskope breaks Firefox
content:
Hi Team,

When we enable Netskope, all the searches breaks (specifically with Google Search Engine). It takes about 2 to 3 mins to do the first search, after which it continues to work normally.

Furthermore, facebook takes too long to load (~4mins).

The netskope support team has asked us to make a few changes in about:config: 1. network.http.http3.enabled 2. QUIC protocol 3. network.udp.enabled

None of this works and even if it works, the problem is we have about 1500 devices.

Are there any reported issues ? And is there anything that we are missing ?
creator: sohanvaradai
